pkgmetadata.longdescription: # rex## git commitvx.x.x## cleanpython setup.py sdist## releasepython setup.py upload --verbose## installpip intall rext## upgradepip install --upgrade rext## upgrade 指定版本pip install --upgrade rext==0.1.22## 镜像会同步不及时，临时使用默认镜像更新pip install -i https://pypi.org/simple --upgrade rext## listpip list## importfrom rext import mstring as ms## useprint(ms.remove_space_all("666 666"))
